Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<java.lang.Object>
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketClientConnection
extends Observable<java.lang.Object>
implements ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
Class for Server-Client communication management. It enables Server to manage multi-client connection.
Author:
AndreaAltomare
See Also:
github.com/emanueledelsozzo/.../SocketClientConnection.java

    • quitHandler

      public boolean quitHandler​(java.lang.Object o)
      Takes an Object message as an argument, determines if it is a QuitEvent, then execute quitting operation for the Client. Returns true if the Object argument is an actual QuitEvent and so the connection with the Client was closed.
      Parameters:
      o - (Object message)
      Returns:
      (Object o is an actual QuitEvent ? true : false)

    • pingHandler

      public boolean pingHandler​(java.lang.Object o)
      Takes an Object message as an argument, determines if it is a PingResponse, then notify the Connection Manager that a Ping response message was received. Returns true if the Object argument is an actual PingResponse.
      Parameters:
      o - (Object message)
      Returns:
      (Object o is an actual PingResponse ? true : false)

    • chatMessageHandler

      public boolean chatMessageHandler​(java.lang.Object o)
      Takes an Object message as an argument, determines if it is a ChatMessageEvent, then send the chat message to all playing-players by using sendAll(...) method in ServerConnection. Returns true if the Object argument is an actual ChatMessageEvent.
      Parameters:
      o - (Object message)
      Returns:
      (Object o is an actual ChatMessageEvent ? true : false)
